description: A CSS stylesheet defining theme colors and styles for a React application, specifically targeting light and dark themes.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, providing central text alignment and theme-based background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo element with specified height and pointer events management.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component styled for maximum height, flex display, and theming.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link element using theme colors with transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes, styled with positioning, colors, and transitions.
